channel.title: My Auto-Restarter Is Broke?
channel.description:
Okay i tried to Re-Install my Voule Auto-Restarter because whenever it goes to restart it says..
" Error Can't Restart ****Scape, Port 43594 Already In Use.."
So i download it, Extract it to folders, And pick ****Scape's Folder.
I Double click it Press 1 Hour as Restart time and i get this as i go to hit start..
[IMG]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb179/omfglolololol/Voulerestarter.jpg[/img]
^^^ Theres the picture. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 07:43:44 AM[/size][hr]Help..

item.title: My Auto-Restarter Is Broke?
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

haha u went through all that trouble to block out the name of your server but on the pics it tells u lmao!

Read full topic

item.title: My Auto-Restarter Is Broke?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:1, topic:105301”]Okay i tried to Re-Install my Voule Auto-Restarter because whenever it goes to restart it says…

" Error Can’t Restart ****Scape, Port 43594 Already In Use…"

So i download it, Extract it to folders, And pick ****Scape’s Folder.

I Double click it Press 1 Hour as Restart time and i get this as i go to hit start…

^^^ Theres the picture. :|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 07:43:44 AM[/size][hr]Help…[/quote]

Scim, your Restarter is not broken. All you need to do it make a batch file called:

voule

And inside add:

@echo off echo Voule Auto restart echo Restarting server title SERVERNAMEHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" -cp .;jar server

Read full topic
